snippet.title: Kotlin Messenger 02: Installing Firebase Auth and Register User + Rounded Corners UI
snippet.description:
Today we create our Firebase App in the console and install the Firebase Auth SDK.  We'll be using this library to register users with email and password.  As a bonus, I'll show you how to get the rounded corners into your Register/Login screens.

Podcasts Course
